meanings.definition: A person or thing that frankes.
meanings.sent1: The frankers in the office always make sure the mail is delivered on time.
meanings.sent2: I saw the frankers at the post office sorting the letters.
meanings.sent3: The little frankers in the mailbox were having a party with the stamps.
meanings.sent4: The frankers in the mailroom worked tirelessly like busy bees.
meanings.sent5: The colorful frankers on the envelopes made them stand out.

meanings.sent1: Franking is an important process in the mailing system.
meanings.sent2: The frankers at the post office ensure that all letters are properly stamped.
meanings.sent3: The ceremony included a special moment of franking the official documents.
meanings.sent4: The art of franking requires precision and attention to detail.
meanings.sent5: The history of franking dates back to ancient times.

meanings.definition: To frank or send by franking.
meanings.sent1: I need to frank the letters before sending them out.
meanings.sent2: She frankers all the packages before they are dispatched.
meanings.sent3: He decided to frank his love letter with a special stamp.
meanings.sent4: The gesture of franking the invitation showed thoughtfulness.
meanings.sent5: Remember to frank the documents to ensure they reach on time.
